thread.section_title: Police: Teen Falls Off Tower After Getting Electrically Shocked – CBS Philly
thread.title: Police: Teen Falls Off Tower After Getting Electrically Shocked
thread.title_full: Police: Teen Falls Off Tower After Getting Electrically Shocked

author: Matt Higgins
title: Police: Teen Falls Off Tower After Getting Electrically Shocked
text:
UPPER BLACK EDDY, Pa. (CBS) — A teenager was electrically shocked after climbing up a tower in Upper Black Eddy.
Pennsylvania State Police tell CBS 3 a 17-year-old boy from Camp Kirby climbed up a tower on the 2200 block of River Road and got shocked.
68-Year-Old Woman Visiting Husband’s Grave Dies Following Cemetery Crash 
The boy fell off the tower and was flown to Lehigh Hospital.
There is no word on his condition.
